mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members(member_id, password, member_name, member_nick, username, member_address, member_phone, member_img) VALUES (member_seq.nextval, #{password}, #{member_name}, #{member_nick}, #{username}, #{member_address}, #{member_phone}, #{member_img})
mapper.update:

member_nick = #{member_nick},
member_explain = #{member_explain},
member_address = #{member_address},
member_phone = #{member_phone},
member_img = #{member_img},
member_update = sysdate
